traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The oculider can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 11 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) damage. Roll 1d6 to determine damage type for each attack. * 1-2   Fire * 3-4   Lightning * 5-6   Acid
